summary.p: Asks him to assist the Englishman, as he is facing strangers.

div.p: Greetings. I beg you, my dearest brother in the Lord, to treat this English guest as if seven Butlers were present there to assist him. I am not speaking of your faith, which needs no witness - let alone seven - but of the diligence, which he greatly needs among strangers.
To his Lord Bullinger, friend and brother.
